text: “Jeremaia, nɨ akam isɨ bar Judan Babilonɨn kalabusɨn itir adarazi bagh anemadagh, kamaghɨn me mɨkɨm suam: Ikiavɨra Itir God, Nehelamɨn nguibamɨn gumazim Semaia gɨnɨghnɨgha ghaze, kɨ ia bagha Semaia amadazir puvatɨ. Ezɨ an akam inigha izir gumazimɨn mɨn akamɨn gun ia mɨkeme, egha ia gamizɨma, ia akar ifavarir kam nɨghnɨzir gavgavim an iti.
